description: Base-8 complement of n (write n in base 8, then replace each digit by its base 8 negative).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4095 (4095 = 8^4 - 1)
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
prog: (Haskell)a055118 0 = 0a055118 n = if d == 0 then 8 * a055118 n' else 8 * a055118 n' + 8 - d            where (n', d) = divMod n 8-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 12 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 19 2000
